summary:
A highly detailed longsword sword using 2048x2048 textures complete with it's own scabbard.
The blade was designed to have the Damascus steel/Valyrian steel pattern.
One Handed and Two Handed included.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.minus.com/iYue5eXgtP4kt.png[/img]

[color=#8f8f8f]
[size=small]


Previous sword in the series - [color=white]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56492/[/color]

[center][youtube]J9zZkYnLIx8[/youtube][/center]
[youtube]qBl5Tn4iVDA[/youtube]

[color=white]-
MARS[/color]

A highly detailed longsword sword using 2048x2048 textures complete with it's own scabbard.
The blade was designed to have the Damascus steel/Valyrian steel pattern.
One Handed and Two Handed included.

[color=white]-
LOCATION[/color]

Both the one handed and two handed can be crafted at any forge under the steel category.

[color=white]-
INSTALLATION[/color]

-Use NMM
or
-Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder
-Make sure the Mars.esp is checked your Launcher

[color=white]-
CHANGE LOG[/color]

1.1 - Added scabbard to greatsword
1.0 - Initial release

[color=white]-
CREDITS[/color]

Thanks to Bethesda
Thanks to Imsumdave for the environmental map
Thanks to Black Tree Gaming Ltd.
Thanks to Novem99 & ttl269 for the nifskope tips

[color=white]-
PERMISSIONS[/color]

Feel free to upload this mod anywhere and include it wherever you please.
Credit would be appreciated.

[/size][/color]
author: Zikoru
